ygData.subject: Re: spells
ygData.msgSnippet: Another question, what language is the different research books in Wisards Canon  is  Old Erudin I think Doctrine of wizardry I dont know, I cant read it
ygData.messageBody:
Another question, what language is the different research books in
Wisards Canon is Old Erudin I think
Doctrine of wizardry I dont know, I cant read it though I have Old Erudin
and Dragon at excelent.

Info would be greatly appreciated

Avari lvl 16 wiz dark elf Fenin ro

-----Original Message-----
From: Brad Fetkovich <fetko1@...>
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, June 16, 1999 9:58 PM
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] spells


>From: "Brad Fetkovich" <fetko1@...>
>
>i like tishans clash, it's nice in the group, i'd say you get around 5
>seconds of stun out of it and only gets resisted about 10% of the time... i
>hear that at higher levels, the stun lasts longer
>
>Fetko, level 24 wiz, Mith Marr
>----- Original Message -----
>From: Lim Dul <sevendegrees@...>
>To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
>Sent: Wednesday, June 16, 1999 3:33 PM
>Subject: [eq_wizards] spells
>
>
>> From: Lim Dul <sevendegrees@...>
>>
>> That's very interesting. I am new to my 20th level spells so I've just
>been
>> experimenting with them every now and again. You say enstill sucks?
I've
>> been very successful with it so far...although I haven't used it that
much
>> yet, I LOVE the period of time it takes for a creature to get out of it.
>:)
>> Not too many fizzles yet...no more than root I'd say. Was I just
lucky?
>> Granted, Root is still more mana efficient for me right now at 20.
>>
>> I haven't used the stun spell "Tishan's Clash" (?) yet. More people hate
>it
>> than like it so far when I ask around. I know it stuns casters... how
>long
>> does this stun period last? Does this stun spell cast at a faster rate
>than
>> any of the shock spells? I'm just wondering if we'd be better off just
>> nuking the MoB as fast as we can rather than waste time stunning it?
>PLEASE
>> prove me wrong. ;) (I'd love to use new spells)
>>
>> -- Lim'Dul
>> 20 Wiz Veeshan
>>
>>
>>
>> >I very rarely use a root in a group anymore (and enstill really is
>> >terrible)
>> >since when I group I usually have 3 tanks in the group that do some good
>> >damge when they are circled around a Target..I wait till I see the
>targets
>> >health go down a bit then cast...watch the health bar go down someomore
>> >from
>> >my cast and the damage the Fighters are doing then cast one last time
for
>a
>> >take down.
>>
>>
